title: About
text:
This website was created by Javed Ali, a Graduate Research Assistant at the University of Central Florida, in collaboration with Dr. Thomas Wahl (Supervisor), Dr. Alejandra Enriquez (Co-Supervisor), and Dr. Md. Mamunur Rashid (Co-Supervisor). Javed has been involved in a National Academy of Sciences funded project “The New First Line of Defense: Building Community Resilience through Residential Risk Disclosure”. This website is a part of the project’s deliverable.
Javed is a Water Resources Engineer and Graduate Research Assistant in the Coastal Risks and Engineering Lab at University of Central Florida (UCF). His work involves multi-hazards risk assessment and analyzing compound climate/weather extreme events and their spatio-temporal interactions and socio-economic impacts using machine learning and statistical methods.
